text:
1. Anushka Sharma Wishes Husband Virat Kohli In An Adorable Post, Thanks God For His Birth
It’s Virat Kohli’s birthday today and Anushka Sharma took to Twitter to share her love for her husband. In an adorable post, she wrote, “Thank God for his birth.”
2. Arbaaz Khan & Sushmita Sen Make An Entrance With Their Partners At Shilpa Shetty’s Star-Studded Diwali Bash
And yesterday, another Diwali party was organised by Shilpa Shetty Kundra. From Salman Khan to Preity Zinta, a lot of celebrities graced the occasion in their ethnic best. What made heads turn was the fact that Arbaaz Khan arrived at the Shilpa Shetty’s Diwali bash with girlfriend Giorgia Andriani and Sushmita Sen with her rumoured boyfriend Rohman Shawl.
3. Ex-CBFC Chief Pahlaj Nihalani Becomes Butt Of Jokes As He Moves To HC Against 20 Cuts In His Film
Censor Board has reportedly ordered multiple cuts in his forthcoming film Rangeela Raja which stars Govinda in a double role, and Pahlaj Nihalani is not ready to back off. He says he will take the matter to court.
4. After The Crazy Trailer Of 2.0 Was Released, It’s Raining Jokes & Memes On Social Media
Don't Miss 3.5 K SHARES 518 SHARES 235 SHARES
However, after the trailer was out, in no time, it inspired a meme-fest on Twitter. From slamming its visual effects to comparing it to MSG, fans couldn’t stop wondering what all the fuss was about.
5. From A Piggyback Ride To Partying With Her Girls, PC's Bachelorette In Amsterdam Looks Fabulous!
Priyanka Chopra is making sure that she has fun with her girl gang including Sophie Turner, Srishti Behl Arya, Tamanna Dutt, Natasha Pal, Chanchal D’Souza and Dana Supnick and PC’s cousin sister Parineeti Chopra. She’ll soon be in Amsterdam.
title: Anushka Sharma’s Adorable Wish For Virat Kohli, Shilpa Shetty’s Diwali Bash & More From Ent
description: From Anushka Sharma’s adorable birthday wish for Virat Kohli to Shilpa Shetty’s star-studded Diwali bash, here’s all that rocked the world of entertainment today. What made heads turn was the fact that Arbaaz Khan arrived at the Shilpa Shetty’s Diwali bash with girlfriend Giorgia Andriani and Sushmita Sen with her rumoured boyfriend Rohman Shawl.
